message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $115 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I've seen similar products for that price point elsewhere.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $110, considering the value and quality of this product. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
